metadata.description: Required. Name of the Log Analytics workspace
Optional. Location for all resources.
Required. Service Tier: PerGB2018, Free, Standalone, PerGB or PerNode
Optional. LAW solutions from the gallery.
Required. Number of days data will be retained for
Optional. The workspace daily quota for ingestion.
Optional. The network access type for accessing Log Analytics ingestion.
Optional. The network access type for accessing Log Analytics query.
Optional. Log Analytics workspace resource identifier

Optional. List of additional Subscription IDs to collect Activity logs from. The subscription holding the Log Analytics workspace is added by default. The user/SPN/managed identity has to have reader access on the subscription you'd like to collect Activity logs from.
Optional. Automation Account resource identifier, value used to create a LinkedService between Log Analytics and an Automation Account.
Optional. Set to 'true' to use resource or workspace permissions and 'false' (or leave empty) to require workspace permissions.
Optional. Switch to lock storage from deletion.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Customer Usage Attribution id (GUID). This GUID must be previously registered

properties.Query: Event | where Source == "ServiceFabricNodeBootstrapAgent" | summarize AggregatedValue = count() by Computer
AzureDiagnostics | where ResourceType == 'AZUREFIREWALLS' and msg_s contains 'Deny'

metadata.description: The Resource Id of the Log Analytics workspace deployed.
The Resource Group log analytics was deployed to.
The Name of the Log Analytics workspace deployed.
The Workspace Id for Log Analytics.
The Primary Shared Key for Log Analytics.
